body: An improved form of leather armor, studded leather armor is covered with dozens of metal protuberances. While these rounded studs offer little defense individually, in the numbers they are arrayed in upon such armor, they help catch lethal edges and channel them away from vital spots. The rigidity caused by the additional metal does, however, result in less mobility than is afforded by a suit of normal leather armor.
name: Studded Leather
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Arms And Armor/Armor/Armor and Shields/Studded Leather
